Name: maid
Description: Helping with food preparation and household chores.

Name: plumber
Description: Specializing in leak repairs, pipe installations, and maintenance of water systems.

Name: electrician
Description: Offering services such as light fixture installations, wiring repairs, and electrical safety inspections.

Name: gardener
Description: Providing lawn care, planting, pruning, and general garden maintenance services.

Name: carpenter
Description: Expertise in woodwork, furniture repair, and construction projects around the home.

Name: painter
Description: Interior and exterior painting services, including color consultation and wallpaper removal.

Name: handyman
Description: General maintenance and repair work, including minor plumbing, electrical, and carpentry tasks.

Name: locksmith
Description: Key cutting, lock replacement, and emergency lockout services.

Name: pestControl
Description: Specialized services for the extermination and prevention of pests such as insects, rodents, and wildlife.
